snippet: The question of who should control the .music suffix is the latest example of the music world's struggle over the Internet, as industry groups and technology giants compete.
abstract: The question of who should control the .music suffix is the latest example of the music world's struggle over the Internet, as industry groups and technology giants compete.

headline.main: Digital Notes: Plans for a New .Music Suffix, but Who Will Own It?
